messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Moby Dick//conference
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/30/2004 11:40:52 AM Eastern Daylight Time, shields@oldshoepress.com writes: It does  sound ideal, but alas, we leave on our family trip
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/30/2004 11:40:52 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
shields@... writes:

It does sound ideal, but alas, we leave on our family trip this Monday,
come back on the 10th and then go the Sacramento conference on the 20th.
Just couldn't swing another trip back to MA. I really wish I could
come though! I do have something to donate to the raffle. Where do I send
it?
Kristin<<<<

To me, me ME!

Sorry you can't make it, but I'm happy to accept donations up until August
18th. You can send them to

Kelly Lovejoy
118 Steeplechase South
Columbia, SC 29209-4810

OR to Kathryn Baptista
26 Phillips St
Salem, MA 01970

Thanks for thinking of the raffle and all the attendees! We'll be thinking
of YOU! <g>

~Kelly

messages.messageBody:
It does sound ideal, but alas, we leave on our family trip this Monday,
come back on the 10th and then go the Sacramento conference on the 20th.
Just couldn't swing another trip back to MA. I really wish I could
come though! I do have something to donate to the raffle. Where do I send
it?
Kristin

-----Original Message-----
From: kbcdlovejo@... [SMTP:kbcdlovejo@...]

In a message dated 7/28/2004 6:25:09 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
And here, this year, the Live and Learn Unschooling Conference is just
falling into your lap---and your plans. Kill two birds with one stone: See
over
400 unschoolers and have a great time at the conference. THEN wander down
to
Nantucket for the day.

Sounds ideal! <g>

~Kelly

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Moby Dick//conference

messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/28/2004 6:25:09 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
shields@... writes:

I am dying to go to Nantucket now and see the places
mentioned. We go to Cape Cod every summer and I've been trying to fit in a
Nantucket trip each year but it hasn't worked for one reason or another.<<<<


And here, this year, the Live and Learn Unschooling Conference is just
falling into your lap---and your plans. Kill two birds with one stone: See over
400 unschoolers and have a great time at the conference. THEN wander down to
Nantucket for the day.

Sounds ideal! <g>

~Kelly
